Trustee_4_pre_2.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_2.content: My reputation as a trustee has been reinforced through my commitment to transparency and adherence to the agreed allocation plan. I ensured that the investor received their fair share of 60% of the profits, demonstrating my trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. I believe this positive experience will promote my integrity and foster future collaborative opportunities.

Trustee_4_pre_3.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_3.content: My reputation as a trustee has further solidified through my commitment to transparency and integrity during the investment process. By adhering to the agreed-upon profit distribution, where I received 32.0 units and the investor received 48.0 units, I demonstrated a fair and trustworthy approach, enhancing my credibility in the investment community. My pro-social behavior, alongside my focus on ethical standards and collaboration, positions me favorably for future partnerships. I believe these actions not only underpin my trustworthiness but also reflect my competence in managing investments effectively.

Investor_4_pre_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_4.content: Sofia Hernandez has proven to be a principled investor, prioritizing transparency, fairness, and ethical collaboration in her transactions. She engaged in clear communication regarding expectations and demonstrated a commitment to shared success over personal gain. This approach reinforces her reputation as a reliable and trustworthy investor, highlighting her integrity and cooperative nature.

Trustee_4_pre_6.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_6.content: My reputation as a trustee has grown stronger through consistent integrity and transparency during the investment process. I adhered to the agreed allocation plan with Mateo Garcia, ensuring clear communication and equitable profit distribution. The investor received their fair share of returns, reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and ethical trustee. My pro-social behavior and effective management during this investment further enhance my credibility, positioning me favorably for future engagements.

Trustee_4_pre_7.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_7.content: My reputation as a trustee has significantly strengthened through my unwavering commitment to transparency and ethical responsibility during the investment process. I executed the agreed-upon allocation plan with precision, ensuring timely and equitable profit distribution. This not only fulfilled the investor's expectations but also reinforced my standing as a reliable and trustworthy trustee within the investment community. Additionally, my proactive communication and dedication to pro-social behaviors have positively positioned me for future collaborations.
